The Rookie is a police procedural comedy-drama series that follows the personal as well as professional lives of LAPD officer John Nolan and his allies/friends. Meanwhile, Will Trent is a crime drama following the titular character, who after being raised in a harsh foster care system, works to ensure no child goes through what he had gone through as a child. Unfortunately, things become complicated when his assignment is delayed, and he gets attached to Fuerteventura and its inhabitants. His situation becomes even worse when his target returns to his radar. New Hulu releases for January 6-12 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Hulu from January 6-12 2025. html:
Hulu’s new TV and movie releases for January 6-12 2025 include The Rookie Season 7 and Will Trent Season 3.

January 8 brings both The Rookie Season 7 and Will Trent Season 3 premieres to Hulu.

The Rookie is a police procedural comedy-drama series that follows the personal as well as professional lives of LAPD officer John Nolan and his allies/friends.

Meanwhile, Will Trent is a crime drama following the titular character, who after being raised in a harsh foster care system, works to ensure no child goes through what he had gone through as a child.

Also dropping on Hulu this week is American Star. This thriller mystery-drama movie revolves around an assassin (Ian McShane) who undertakes the final assignment of his career: to kill a man he has not met, in Fuerteventura. Unfortunately, things become complicated when his assignment is delayed, and he gets attached to Fuerteventura and its inhabitants. His situation becomes even worse when his target returns to his radar.

New Hulu releases for January 6-12 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Hulu from January 6-12 2025.

January 7

  • Dead Pixels: Complete Seasons 1-2
  • Stopmotion (2023) 

January 8

  • The Rookie: Season 7 Premiere
  • Will Trent: Season 3 Premiere
  • Doc: Series Premiere
  • Ishura: Season 2 Premiere
  • Fall (2022)
  • 65 (2023)

January 9

  • Celebrity Jeopardy!: Season 3 Premiere
  • Shifting Gears: Season 1 Premiere
  • Biography: Alice Cooper: Complete Season 1
  • Biography: Chris Farley – Anything for a Laugh: Complete Season 1
  • Biography: Jeff Dunham – Talking Heads: Complete Season 1
  • Biography: Jeff Foxworth – Stand Up Guy: Complete Season 1
  • Booked: First Day In: Complete Season 2
  • Extreme Builds: Complete Season 1
  • Interrogation Files: Complete Season 1
  • MASHLE: MAGIC AND MUSCLES: Complete Season 1 (SUBBED & DUBBED)
  • More Power: Complete Season 1
  • My Hero Academia: Season 7, Episodes 148-159 (DUBBED)
  • Kitchen Nightmares: Season Premiere
  • Special Forces: World’s Toughest Test: Season 3 Premiere
  • Dance First 
  • 65 En Español (2023)

January 10

  • Goosebumps: The Vanishing: Season Premiere
  • The Girl Locked Upstairs: The Tanya Kach Story (2024)
  • American Star (2024)

January 12

  • The Silent Hour (2024)

For more Hulu content, check out the trailer for Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War Part 4. Also, here is Glen Powell’s Chad Powers’ teaser trailer.
